channel.title: Japanese Culture Club UVic
channel.description: Recent content on Japanese Culture Club UVic

item.title: About
item.description: Here you can find some information about our club you may have! If there is something you can't find here to contact us! What is the Japanese Culture Club? We are a club made up of Japanese students and students interested in Japanese culture. We host a variety of events in a laid back setting. Whether you know the language or not we welcome everyone regardless of ability. When was the Japanese Culture Club established?

item.title: Creating the Japanese Culture Club Website
item.description: Why Does Japanese Culture Club Need a Website? That is an excellent question which I will not answer at this moment.
